It had more to do with how Pekora was extremely nervous about ruining the HoloServer's existing Nether portal. For someone who's generally considerate of others, polite, and responsible (her off-stream personality, not on-stream persona), the last thing Pekora wanted was to become a bother for everyone else on HoloServer and draw real negative attention to herself.
@AHHHEYGAO even her on stream persona, even if chaotic at times, is also very considerate of others... Even those extortion clips, she would either compensate or apologies to the members involved~
@AHHHEYGAO does she not know that there's more efficient gold farm in nether roof rather making huge portals that could potentially make the server lags?

Stream "persona" is such a weird term in her case to be honest. I mean she obviously has a diffrent personality IRL and it would be dumb to say otherwise, but it's not that simple. In her early days her "persona" was trying a bit too hard in being a cute idol but over the year she realised who she is as Pekora and what are her strengths. That's why she's so likeable nowadays, a genuine mix of her "crazy bunny comedian" side, a cute and pure idol, a vulgar kusogaki and a very sensitive, polite and caring peron (who she is IRL) that wants others to have good fun too. But what's great is this "persona" feels natural and not like some forced acting.

@starnighl I think she knows. Because if you search for gold farm, especially for Java version, Nether Roof version will pop up first. The nether portal are famous for Bedrock version.
